regulationsummary: The regulation establishes the framework for licensing and accrediting individuals and corporations to provide VA services, including deemed licensing periods, written decision notices, objection rights, and closingdown periods It sets out the conditions under which individuals are deemed licensed or approved as responsible officers, the timelines for notifications and objections, and the requirements for monitoring and reporting during the closingdown period The rules also impose reporting obligations for specified cash transactions and allow the Commission to impose additional requirements on corporations or individuals during the first 12 months of licensing Enhanced due diligence EDD is required for certain highrisk individuals and for large cash transactions, while routine monitoring applies to all other cases

actionablerules.obligation: Track and record the 12month deemed licensing period for each individual who meets the conditions for deemed licensing
actionablerules.whoitappliesto: Individuals who have applied for a VA service licence 53ZRL and accreditation 53ZRM and satisfy all conditions in subsection 1ad
risksignalstomonitor: Application remains pending beyond the 12month period without withdrawal or objection
No recorded start or end date for the deemed licensing period
requireddocumentsorcontrols: Internal log of start date first day of deemed period and end date withdrawal, refusal, or 12month expiry
Automated reminder system to flag when the 12month period is approaching

actionablerules.obligation: Issue a written notice section 5 or 7 notice to the individual within the first 12 months of the decision on their application
actionablerules.whoitappliesto: All individuals whose application decisions are made under sections 5 or 7
risksignalstomonitor: No notice sent within 12 months of decision
requireddocumentsorcontrols: Template notice containing decision, reasons, and objection rights
Audit trail confirming receipt by the individual

actionablerules.obligation: Provide a 12month objection period for deemed withdrawal of an application and monitor for objections
actionablerules.whoitappliesto: All applicants whose applications are subject to deemed withdrawal under section 10
risksignalstomonitor: Objection not filed within the 12month period
requireddocumentsorcontrols: Record of the date the specified notice was issued
Log of objection receipt and date
Automated reminder to the applicant 30 days before objection deadline

actionablerules.obligation: Enforce a 3month closingdown period for corporations after denial, withdrawal, or refusal of a VA service licence
actionablerules.whoitappliesto: Corporations whose application for a VA service licence 53ZRK is denied, withdrawn, or refused
risksignalstomonitor: Business continues to operate beyond the 3month closingdown period
No formal cessation notice issued to the corporation
requireddocumentsorcontrols: Closingdown period start date date of notice

actionablerules.obligation: Conduct Enhanced Due Diligence on individuals applying as responsible officers when any of the conditions in subsection 1ad are not fully satisfied
actionablerules.whoitappliesto: Individuals applying for responsible officer approval 53ZRP who do not meet all conditions in subsection 1ad
risksignalstomonitor: Applicant from a highrisk jurisdiction or on a sanctions list
requireddocumentsorcontrols: Background check reports sanctions, PEP, adverse media
Source of funds and wealth verification
actionablerules.requiresedd: Yes  due to incomplete documentation or highrisk profile

actionablerules.obligation: Submit a cash transaction report for any specified cash transaction exceeding HK120,000 or equivalent by a nonHong Kong precious metals and stones dealer
actionablerules.whoitappliesto: NonHong Kong precious metals and stones dealers conducting cash transactions with customers
risksignalstomonitor: Customer from a highrisk country or with suspicious travel patterns
requireddocumentsorcontrols: Cash transaction report containing dealer info, customer info, travel details, transaction details, and payment amount
Verification of customer identity and source of funds
Retention of supporting documents for 5 years
actionablerules.requiresedd: Yes  for customers with highrisk indicators or large cash amounts
